        y - The y coordinate of the centre

      • drawPoint

        public void drawPoint(double x,
                      double y)
        Draw a small circle, centred at the given point. This method calls the overloaded version defined with floats, after casting its arguments.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the centre
        y - The y coordinate of the centre

        Parameters:
        x1 - The x coordinate of the starting point
        y1 - The y coordinate of the starting point
        x2 - The x coordinate of the ending point
        y2 - The x coordinate of the ending point

      • scale

        public void scale(float xs,
                  float ys)
        Set the scaling factor of the view port.
        Parameters:
        xs - The horizontal scale factor. All x-coordinates will be scaled away from the origin by this factor (must be positive)
        ys - The vertical scale factor. All y-coordinates will be scaled away from the origin by this factor (must be positive)

      • resetScale

        public void resetScale()
        Reset the scaling to its original (default) value.

      • pan

        public void pan(float deltaX,
                float deltaY)
        Pan the view port deltaX units horizontally and deltaY units vertically.
        Parameters:
        deltaX - The amount in user space coordinates to pan right by (a negative value means pan left)
        deltaY - The amount in user space coordinates to pan up by (a negative value means pan down)

      • setViewPort

        public void setViewPort(float lox,
                        float loy,
                        float hix,
                        float hiy)
        Set the view port by setting the coordinate bounds of its 4 corners.
        Parameters:
        lox - The x coordinate of the left edge
        loy - The y coordinate of the bottom edge
        hix - The x coordinate of the right edge
        hiy - The y coordinate of the top edge

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the view port to its original (default) setting.
